cause.description:
~this cause is to try and stop men from degrading women so much, and stop thinking all we are good for is sex, even on TV you see girls with small pieces of clothing shaking there asses and making men think we are only good for sex! it happens in TV, music, schools, and every day life, so i would like the people who care about this topic to join and support this cause as much as possible. thnx!
1. in schools girls are sexually harassed all of the time!
2. at work women are sexually harassed
3. playboy?i dont care if there is a playgirl too its still degrading!
cause.name: Womens Rights 101
